title: Safety in the Workplace
headline: Learn about Safety in the Workplace, types of workplace hazards and safey programs with this free online course.
description: This free online course Safety in the Workplace teaches students about how to be safer in a workplace and how to set up employee safety program for their workplace. The course will help you understand stress management, workplace violence, and drug and alcohol abuse. Students will learn how to identify your company's hazards like chemical and fire risks. So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about Safety in the Workplace.
courseDescription:
This course, Safety in the Workplace, will provide you with an understanding of the various safety hazards in your workplace and how to use that information to work safely. You will learn about stress management . You will be able to explain how to Identify the various safety hazards of your workplace. You will also learn about writing a safety plan and properly implementing it.

This course then explains the importance of safety. You will learn about fire risks as well as chemical and electrical hazards. You will also learn about ergonomics. Students will also learn about Workplace violence. The course teaches about transportation and workplace machinery and their relationship to better safety practices.

This course then wraps up lessons about general health and wellness at the workplace. You will learn about creating a culture of wellness by creating various health and wellness programs. By taking this course you will learn about the importance of workplace safety, how to recognize safety concerns, and how to implement a plan to address those concerns. So why wait? Start learning today.
